# Tender Announcement
### Steuereinheit, Pers
### PW-22-01016027
**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) for Parachutes and Associated Equipment

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01016027
** Solicitation Number:** W8485-227039/A
**Publication Date:** December 5, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 13, 2023, 2:00 PM (EST)
**Procuring Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Bid Description:**

The Department of National Defence invites interested suppliers to submit a bid to supply parachutes and associated equipment.

**Key Requirements:**

* The delivery is requested to Canadian Army Airborne Warfare Centre (CAAWC) Trenton, ON, by February 28, 2023.
* Item 1: 60 units of Military CYPRES AAD (GSIN 1670, NSN 12-361-9578, Part No. 3431322, NCAGE C5088).
* Item 2: 25 units of Activator Parachute, Automatic (GSIN 1670, NSN 20-004-2665, Part No. ML3121000, NCAGE L3969).
* Item 3: 200 units of Filter Element (GSIN 1670, NSN 12-364-7302, Part No. 900004, NCAGE C5088).

**Language of Bid:**

The bid documents may be submitted in either English or French.

**Important Information:**

* In light of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of other methods of delivery.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Trade Agreements:**

This opportunity is subject to the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**How to Submit a Bid:**

Please submit your bid electronically or by mail to the address listed below.

**Contact Information:**

Danny Lebel
dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca

We look forward to receiving your bid!
